definition: reborn (of departed spirit)/to be reincarnated/to leave home for a new life
to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Slouches towards Bethlehem to be born?
sentences.chinese: 懶散的踏向伯利恆的投生？

sentences.english: They were signed, so to speak, before you were born in this existence.
sentences.chinese: 可以說，在你投生這個存在層面之前就已經簽約。

sentences.english: Her soul sojourned in the dimension of Jupiter prior to incarnating into the earth.
sentences.chinese: 她的靈魂在投生至地球前，曾逗留在木星的維度。

definition: to die/future incarnation/next life/to be born/to come into the world/future generation
to be reborn/to live in paradise (Buddhism)/to die/(after) one's death

to surpass/to transcend/to perform religious ceremonies to help the soul find peace
